body: Moral of the story: Girls are not into gamer boys. They like men with actual life. If you're hurt by this doujin, touch grass 🤣

But it's much more productive than just name calling in the comment section or posting demands to the authors in place and language they can't read. That should have been suggested more as therapy method in the NTR tag comment section, write your own revenge fanfic. They might even build their own community of friends and rivals seeing who can make a better story :D
When some rando writes their own fanfic because a book bothered them enough that they felt they had to make their own ending, that is probably as pathetic as pathetic can get.
mann, it's just over huh. no after story for the loser MC
Moral of the fable (it has three parts): women are like cats because they always land on their feet.

南無月光如來，色即是空，空即是色

I read the webnovel of this after what happened during swinging. The MC met some gigachad bro that helped him move on and made progress in life, became happier and gotten better grades that the black haired girl kept glaring at him from time to time but they didn't speak to one another again because of the incident. In the end the bro had to go and MC eventually accepted and continued living life happy by watering plants
Well this is boring than i thought

By standard, this was crap NTR manga but great H manga because there's no NTR here at all. The author is lazy they never shows MC tried forming a bond with two girls. All he did was just having a crush, having fantasy high above cloud nine without knowing anything about them and try to bend one of them to his liking. This made me get super annoyed and don't care about him at all. He deserved that. Even if he asked them out, they may say NO (Mei might as a one-time deal, but Asahi? Nope. She might just aiming for prez in the first place). And the later part was to revealed one girl is kinda very expierienced and one is a cunning devil with angel's face. Also, Asahi is very realistic. You'd find her in grown-up relationships all the time. "Eh... I know nothing about that"... my arse haha.
more revenge

i hope the mein mc man's up a year later trains his body  and gets revenges
by fucking the two girls mother's and ruining  his brother's reputation.
needs revenge its better  then ntr

Ah, the published full story of a cuck... No, in reality the MCs of this are the girls since there really was of no redeemable quality for the boy, both girls kinda had motives on this to tell you the truth. By the end of it where he kept peeking after Mei gave him some advice on "confidence", both of them already were double dating and having orgies, he clearly speaks at the worst time after the deed was done and he clearly showed  that he was just expecting the relationship to happen to him in the beginning rather than actually try to speak to them when they were doing their studies.

@A-san: it's probably just this offshot genre's taste. Like the readers, the MC only see the girls from the sideline, he's nothing special to them. Then, he can only watch as someone more attractive came and win the girl while he's doing nothing until it's too late. | Honestly, the only thing Yuuto brings to the story is bitter taste. The story still could be interesting without him.

the son of a bitch got this published ..... I didn't expect this, as many of us have different feelings about this work and while on the one hand we think it's trash, we wish there was a reinvindication of Kido, and the fact that it's published by an established publisher (Tenma, Misaki is an indie publisher, that's why the quality of this edition is much higher because of the standards they ask for in print format <600-1200 dpi>) has already given it chances not only to have a continuation, but also to have an animation (although don't get excited, if anyone would animate it, it would be Queen Bee). ... any way we'll have to wait until mid-July to see the mid-year results of toranoana to see if it makes it into the top 30, and the sales rankings of fanza and melonbooks to see how it did.
Pain and I can't stop
Nice.....!
I really hope the mc can get a revenge.
Atleast show us what the hell mc is doing is he gonna stay a pussy his whole life or what
The last two stories is Mei before and Asahi after the main NTR story. Asahi felt bad for Yuu, but thanks to her new BF, she got over it.
Shitty story, great art. Re-fappable material right here.

This is a commercially published version, so it would have more reach compared to the previous edition released through Fanza (cmiiw, it's one of those subscribe to artist kind of model?). Would still be good without the middle brother. Yeah, an extra story would have been a good gesture of fan service. Yuu's life is probably still sucks (his neighbour already got a boyfriend). I'm also curious about the change of their relationship after the group sex. Mei seems to still like Itsuki. And after Itsuki graduated, I wonder if they're still in contact with each other (Mei still Asahi's friend, and if she's still dating Souma). Could just be Asahi distancing herself after thinking she had done a bad thing to Yuu.

Lazy work by this author. He should learn from other authors with a story arc compilation. Since this is a compilation of his work into one, he should draw a bit more. At least give us a little more story of the brother. Maybe show that he is doing better or worse. By doing this compilation and nothing more, he is just trying to milk his work for minimum effort.
Fuck this whole story
first com bitch will be always bitch....
